column4: I just reinstalled Ubuntu on a ext3 parittion. I also have a vfat partition for files. When I try to access it in Linux I can't get to it. Do I need to remount it?
Download and run http://www.ubuntulinux.nl/files/winmac_fstab to make your windows and mac partions mount automatically
look at what I just said :)
either add it as repo or manually download a java .deb file from there
